itunes:title: Episode 848 - Should Trans Athletes Compete in the Olympics?
title: Episode 848 - Should Trans Athletes Compete in the Olympics?
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Robin Lundberg of Sports Illustrated and CBS Sports Radio to talk NBA Playoffs and why the Nets would have absolutely won it all had they been healthy, Kyrie Irving eccentricity, and trans weight lifter Laure...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Robin Lundberg of Sports Illustrated and CBS Sports Radio to talk NBA Playoffs and why the Nets would have absolutely won it all had they been healthy, Kyrie Irving eccentricity, and trans weight lifter Laurel Hubbard competing in the Tokyo Olympics.
